summary_md: Albania, in the latest year, boasts a per capita GDP (5,726 USD per person) and an inflation rate (2.21%) of notable figures, alongside a moderate unemployment rate (10.25%) and a life expectancy (79.60 years) that reflects the country's health environment. The nation's internet usage (83.10%) indicates a growing digital presence, while its share of global exports (36.11%) suggests a developing economy.

sections.economy_md: Albania's economy is characterized by a per capita GDP (5,726 USD per person) and a share of global exports (36.11%), indicating a developing economic landscape with room for growth.
sections.labor_md: With an unemployment rate (10.25%), Albania's labor market presents both challenges and opportunities for job seekers and entrepreneurs.
sections.digital_md: The country's internet usage (83.10%) is on the rise, pointing to an increasingly connected population and potential for digital entrepreneurship.
sections.health_env_md: Albania's life expectancy (79.60 years) suggests a health environment that supports a relatively long and healthy life for its citizens.

entrepreneur: Growing digital presence (83.10%) to capitalize on
digital_nomad: Increasing internet usage (83.10%) for remote work
Economic and digital growth (36.11%, 83.10%) to thrive
expat_family: Healthy life expectancy (79.60 years) for family well-being
Economic and digital opportunities (36.11%, 83.10%) for family success
